title: Help Refugees
subtitle:
AWESOME to see @FlyingSeagullUK bringing joy and amazement to refugee children on Samos.
‚Å£
Life here can be unbearably hard, with overcrowding, fear and an uncertain future. 

Laugher, smiles and mind-blowing acrobatics make such a change to harsh refugee camp life. #chooselovepic.twitter.com/XakR4MWKVD

title: #IranianRefugeesInTurkey
subtitle:
#Sarah a 15-year-old Iranian refugee girl who is currently hospitalized in Turkey. she has been ill for many years.Unfortunately, she cannot be treated in Turkey and every day this girl and her family are tormented. How does the world close its eyes?

#IranianRefugeesInTurkeypic.twitter.com/JLAVxZvFQi

title: heather prgs
subtitle: The best news. Paris Refugee Ground Support PRGS and MARDi keep their home at the Landy Sauvage squat in #Paris for this winter. This is brilliant news for the estimated 3500 refugees living on the streets who rely on these Voluntary Groups for shelter, warmth and medical needs. pic.twitter.com/ZxL3xoLy1U

title: Jennifer Rankin
subtitle:
Hungary, Poland and Czech Republic broke EU law by refusing to accept refugee quotas - ECJ advocate-general says in non-binding opinion.

Nutshell of opinion: Rule of law means respecting legal obligations even when "unwelcome of unpopular".

https://curia.europa.eu/jcms/upload/docs/application/pdf/2019-10/cp190133en.pdf¬†‚Ä¶pic.twitter.com/Jq9hQBbsqn
